function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential ramifications of overcrowding in apartment buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission and spread, especially in vulnerable communities","Mitigation":"Developing more resilient apartment building typologies with flexible layouts, safe congregate spaces, and well-ventilated circulation routes","Technologies":"Advanced architectural design and building techniques","People":"Occupants of apartment buildings, especially in vulnerable communities","Owner":"Architects, developers, and community planners"},{"Description":"Lack of data and evidence relating architectural parameters to pandemic resilience","Impact":"Inability to provide specific guidance for future design practices to mitigate contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Collecting better data to relate architectural parameters like building entrance type, circulation space, ventilation, and daylighting conditions to pandemic resilience","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, building monitoring technologies","People":"Architectural researchers, designers, and urban planners","Owner":"Architectural research institutions, design firms, and urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Unsustainable urban sprawl leading to inadequate pandemic response infrastructures","Impact":"Inability to effectively support pandemic response due to low-density living environments and sprawled infrastructures","Mitigation":"Developing compact cities with well-mixed land use and high-density living environments to support better infrastructures for pandemic response","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, modeling and simulation software for city development","People":"Urban planners, policy makers, and developers","Owner":"City planning authorities, government organizations"}]}
